column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Second was for lunch. We were seated in a different area I was in the first time
column3: and that was quite dreadful. People were constantly shuffling past us
column4: and the food wasn't quite as good as it was the first time. Some of it was a bit too cold
column5: some of it was so hot I thought they'd stuck it in the microwave for ten minutes.
